definition: a wooden or bamboo pen for sheep or cattle/wood or bamboo trestlework/a warehouse
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
plank walkway constructed on the face of a cliff/(archaic) elevated passageway connecting the upper levels of adjacent towers
a pier/a landing-stage/a loading trestle for goods or passengers/a platform
to be reluctant to give up a post

lit. repair the plank road by day while secretly crossing the Wei River 渭河[Wei4 He2] at Chencang (idiom, refers to a stratagem used by Liu Bang 劉邦|刘邦[Liu2 Bang1] in 206 BC against Xiang Yu 項羽|项羽[Xiang4 Yu3] of Chu)/fig. to feign one thing while doing another/to cheat under cover of a diversion
pinyin: ming2 xiu1 zhan4 dao4 , an4 du4 Chen2 cang1

definition: cargo receipt/landing account/warehouse or storage receipt/CL:張|张[zhang1]
to have a long and hard journey (idiom)

sentences.english: Our model abstracts, or virtualizes, the lower levels of the technology stack.
sentences.chinese: 我们的模型对技术栈的较低层进行了抽象或虚拟化。

sentences.english: In some cases directly support the concept of an interception stack.
sentences.chinese: 有某些情况下直接支持截取栈概念。

sentences.english: The sample infrastructure architecture above uses the protocol stack notation.
sentences.chinese: 上面的基础体系结构示例使用协议栈表示法。

sentences.english: One result is a stack of something called “web-services” standards.
sentences.chinese: 一个结果是一组叫做“网络服务”的标准栈。

sentences.english: You want to measure at every layer of your software stack.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望在软件栈的各个层面都能度量。

sentences.english: However, the thread's stack and other resources will not be deallocated.
sentences.chinese: 不过，线程的栈和其他资源将不会被收回。

sentences.english: Overwriting the saved return-instruction pointer in a stack frame.
sentences.chinese: 重写栈框架中经过保存的返回指令指针。

sentences.english: If you reduce the default stack size, you can create more threads.
sentences.chinese: 如果您减小默认栈大小，那么可以创建更多线程。

sentences.english: At the bottom of the stack is the link layer.
sentences.chinese: 这个栈的最底部是链路层。

sentences.english: How does creating a facade object for each pseudo-method request stack up?
sentences.chinese: 如何建立一个门面对象为每个伪方法要求栈吗？

sentences.english: By restricting the stack depth to three levels, you should avoid unexpected behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 通过将栈深度限制为三层，您应该能避免意外行为。

sentences.english: Destructors are often executed during stack unwinding.
sentences.chinese: 栈展开期间会经常执行析构函数。

sentences.english: The stack reacts to the timeout by resetting the congestion window back to an empty state.
sentences.chinese: 栈对超时的响应是把拥塞窗口重设回空状态。

sentences.english: Yes, SOA and SOI can share the same technology stack.
sentences.chinese: 没错，SOA和SOI可以共享相同的技术栈。

sentences.english: The stack information is usually required for servicability of the product.
sentences.chinese: 产品的高可维护性通常要用到栈的信息。

definition: lane (usually as part of a street name)/memorial archway
to fast or abstain from meat, wine etc/vegetarian diet/study room/building/to give alms (to a monk)
academy of classical learning (Tang Dynasty - Qing Dynasty)
(history) to have an audience with the Emperor
to go upstream/to trace the source
